testsuite.name: Looping Template Test Suite (All device above os 10)

testcase.name: TPAT gesture
testcase.summary: Observe TPAT gesture in report Ad
testcase.preconditions:
1)Play the Ad.

2)Open end card and tap on any button of endcard .

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy.

2)Start the App.

3)Initialize and Play the Ad.

4)Open end card and tap any part of the end card.

5)Observe reportAd in charles.
step.expectedresults: When a user touch any part of the end-card In reportAd, should see the gesture information attached to "action."

testcase.name: Play a Native Ad
testcase.summary: Check Native Ad is play normally or not
testcase.preconditions:
1. On Vungle dashboard create pub id and associate with new Dynamic Template e.g. “Dynamic Template Native in-feed”  
  2. Add the created pub id in App
  3. Initialize the App
  4. Play the Ad

step.actions:
1. Initialize the App
  2. play the Ad.
step.expectedresults: Native Ad should play normally [embedded (non full screen) containers] on APP.

testcase.name: TPAT notification
testcase.summary: Observe TPAT notification in charles
testcase.preconditions: 1)Play the full Ad.

step.actions:
1)Set charles proxy.

2)Start the App.

3)Initialize and Play full Ad.

4)Observe reportAd in charles.
step.expectedresults: Should see "tpat" attribute that send checkpoint 1, 0.25, 0.50, 0.75

testcase.name: Close button
testcase.summary: Observe the close button on video
testcase.preconditions: 1)Play the Ad.

step.actions:
1)Start the App.
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Tap on close botton on video.
step.expectedresults: Ad unit should have close button on video.

testcase.name: CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS":"5/4/2
testcase.summary: Manipulate the "CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS":"5/4/2" value
testcase.preconditions: Set "CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS" parameter value as "5/4/2" in requestAd

step.actions:
1)Set "CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS":"5/4/2" value.

2)Start the App.

3)Initialize and Play the Ad.

4)Tap on close button on video.
step.expectedresults: The Close button should show up on the video page after define seconds.

testcase.name: Set Close button value as "0" second
testcase.summary: Manipulate the "CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS":"0" value
testcase.preconditions: Set "CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS" parameter value as "0" in requestAd

step.actions:
1)Set "CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS":"0" value.

2)Start the App.

3)Initialize and Play the Ad.

4)Tap on close button on video.
step.expectedresults: Default value of close button is CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS = 0 . Close button should present at all times .

testcase.name: Incentivized Ad
testcase.summary: Check incentivized button functionality on video
testcase.preconditions: Turn on incentivized button from option tab of TestApp

step.actions:
1)Start the App.
2)Turn on incentivized button from option tab of TestApp.
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Tap on close botton on video.
step.expectedresults:
After clicking close button video should pause and incentivized popup should display on video with below text and buttons:
Text: "Are you sure . you want close the Ad"
buttons:-
a)Close:- Tap on close button And should close.
b)Continue:- Tap on continue button And should resume when it pause.

"templateFormat": "interstitial",

testcase.name: video overlay
testcase.summary: Check Video overlay time.

step.actions:

2.Play the ad.
step.expectedresults:
1.When video starts overlay should appear & disappear after 3 seconds.

testcase.name: incentivized button on video
testcase.summary: Check incentivized button on video
testcase.preconditions: Turn on incentivized button from option page of TestApp

step.actions:
1)Start the App.
2)Turn on incentivized button from option tab of TestApp.
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Tap on close botton on video.
4)Tap any where on screen.
step.expectedresults: When Incentivized popup appears on screen,Ad pause. Now tap anywhere on screen. Ad should not resumed.

testcase.name: Observe for reportAd

testcase.preconditions: Set charles proxy

1)Set charles proxy.
2)Start the App.
3)Initialize and Play the Ad.
4)Open end card and tap any part of the end card.
5)Observe reportAd in charles.
step.expectedresults: “Ad duration” parameter in reportAd:- when Ad play and Ad experience close by user reportAd is created , In reportAd this parameter show the total value of time duration of Ads.

testcase.name: App Icon

step.actions:

2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Open end card .
4)Observe App icon on end card
step.expectedresults:
app icon should display that is set by App _ICON token
App icon should display on overlay of video.

testcase.name: App Name/Title

step.expectedresults:
app name Should display that is set by App name token

testcase.name: App Description

step.expectedresults:
app description Should display that is set by App description token

testcase.name: CTA Button
testcase.summary: Observe the CTA button
testcase.preconditions: Set "VIDEO_SHOW_CTA" parameter value as "false"/"true"

step.actions:
1)Start the App.

2)Initialize and Play the Ad.

3)Observe the CTA/download button on video.
step.expectedresults:
1) "false"-->On the video page, the CTA/download button (Download button on the left bottom) should not be visible

2) "true"-->On the video page, the CTA button (Download button on the left bottom) should be visible

testcase.name: Screen Resolution
testcase.summary: Observe Screen resolution of different device
testcase.preconditions: Play the Ad on different device which having small, medium and larger resolution screen

step.actions:
1)Start the App.

2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
step.expectedresults:
For small devices :- >=320px (small devices such as iPhone 4s, 5 & 5S, Galaxy S3/S4)
For medium devices:- >=360px (majority of recent mobile devices such as iPhone 6/6S, Galaxy S5, HTC One)
For Large devices:- >=768 px (majority of tablet devices such as iPad 1st generation, iPad Mini, Galaxy Tab)

testcase.name: Platform-specific Round Corners

testcase.preconditions: Platform-specific Round Corners

step.expectedresults: Only for IOS and Android :- Refer following link for this https://vungle.atlassian.net/wiki/display/MRAID/Test+Cases+for+MRAID+Ad+Unit+Templates

testcase.name: Ad video is looped continuously
testcase.summary: Check Ad video is looped continuously
testcase.preconditions: Play the Ad

step.actions:
1)Start the App.

2)Initialize and Play the Ad.

3)Tap on close button after 3/4/5 loops of Ad.
step.expectedresults: Looping video :- Dynamic Interstitial 16:9 must play video infinitely unless a user chooses to exist the ad experience

testcase.name: Inline Video-with TPATS
testcase.summary: Check Inline Video with TPATS
testcase.preconditions: Set charles proxy.

step.actions:
1)Start the App. 
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Tap on close button after 3/4/5 loops of Ad.
step.expectedresults: At first loop of video :- 1.TPAT should send by breakpoints 0, 25, 50, 75, 100. successful Viewed As sets after watching 80% of a video

testcase.name: Inline Video
testcase.summary: Check reportAd for Inline Video
testcase.preconditions: Set charles proxy.

step.actions:
1)Start the App. 
2)Initialize and Play the Ad.
3)Tap on close button after 3/4/5 loops of Ad.
step.expectedresults: Video Viewed and Video Length events should show in reportAd

testcase.name: Inline Video- incentivizedAd
testcase.summary: Check Inline Video with incentivizedAd
testcase.preconditions: Turn on incentivized option from option page of TestApp

step.actions:
1)Start the App.

2)Initialize and Play the Ad.

3)Tap on close button
step.expectedresults:
1)For incentivizedAd, if user click on close button before watching 80% of a video. Incentivized dialog box should be appear on screen.

2)For incentivizedAd, if user click on close button after watching 80% of a video. Incentivized dialog box should not appear on screen , video should close.

testcase.name: Inline Video-Inline Video after one loop of Ad
testcase.summary: Check Inline Video after one loop of Ad
testcase.preconditions: Play the Ad

step.actions:
1)Start the App.

2)Initialize and Play the Ad.

3)Tap on close button after 3/4/5 loops of Ad.
step.expectedresults:
1)After the first loop of video :-1.Do not collect TPAT events
2)Do not send videoViewed and videoLength events in reportAd
3)No dialog box pops up for incentivizedAd.

testcase.name: video display
testcase.summary: Check  video when VIDEO_CROP token is set to true/false when user makes creative with Native ad - Cinematic template.
testcase.preconditions: Set VIDEO_CROP  token as false/true.

step.actions:
1.Start the App. 
2.Initialise and Play the Ad.
step.expectedresults:
*1. VIDEO_CROP token is set to true-
 
For Responsive Video containers-
1.Crop video should be displayed in 4:3 ratio.
2.Square videos should never be cropped, irrespective of whether the VIDEO_CROP token value is true or false: 
 
For Medium breakpoint (portrait)-
1.Horizontal video should automatically fills the container and is then cropped on the left and right up to 4:3 of the video width.
2.Square video should scale to fit inside the app container. In mobile portrait, any blank edges should only appear on the right-hand side.
 
For Medium breakpoint (landscape)-
1.Horizontal video should automatically fills the container and is then cropped on the left and right up to 4:3 of the video width.
2.Square video should scale to fit inside the app container. In mobile portrait, any blank edges should only appear on the right-hand side.
 
*2. VIDEO_CROP token is set to false-
 
For Responsive Video containers-
1.User should not be able to crop the video.
2.Video should be displayed in 16:9 ratio.
 
For Medium breakpoint (portrait)-
1.Video should display appropriately.
 
For Medium breakpoint (landscape)-
1.Video should display appropriately.

video should contain a gradient overlay, the app info should overlap the gradient.

testcase.name: Verify the INCENTIVIZED_CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS" parameter.
testcase.summary: To verify the visibility of close button.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.

2. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Set a Charles Proxy.

2. Manipulate 'INCENTIVIZED_CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS' value to "0/5/9999" in response payload of Ads.

3. Laod and Play Ad.

4. Observe the close button appearance on video.
step.expectedresults:
1. If 'INCENTIVIZED_CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS' is 0 then close button should visible with the Ad and after tapping on close button incentivized popup should display on Ad.

2. If 'INCENTIVIZED_CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS' is 5 then close button should visible the Ad after 5 seconds of Adplay and after tapping on close button incentivized popup should display on Ad.

3. if 'INCENTIVIZED_CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS' is 0 then close button should not visible on the Ad.

testcase.summary: To verify the default value of token "SHOW_OVERLAY_WHEN"

testcase.name: To verify "SHOW_OVERLAY_WHEN" with value "Start/Delayed/End/onClick/Hidden/alwaysVisible".
testcase.summary: To verify "SHOW_OVERLAY_WHEN" with value "Start/Delayed/End/onClick/Hidden/alwaysVisible".
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Set a charles Proxy.

2. Manipulate the "SHOW_OVERLAY_WHEN" with different value as "Start/Delayed/End/onClick/Hidden/alwaysVisible" in response payload of Ads.

3. Laod and Play Ad.

4. Observe the appearance of Overlay on video.
step.expectedresults:
1. If "SHOW_OVERLAY_WHEN" = start then Ad Overlay should be displayed on video from the start and toggle through the user interaction.

2. If "SHOW_OVERLAY_WHEN" = Delayed then Ad Overlay should be displayed on video after specified time mentioned in "OVERLAY_START_TIME" and toggle through the user interaction.

3. If "SHOW_OVERLAY_WHEN" = end then Ad Overlay should be displayed on video at the end of the first loop and toggle through the user interaction.

4. If "SHOW_OVERLAY_WHEN" = onClick then Ad Overlay should be displayed on video after user interaction on video.

5. If "SHOW_OVERLAY_WHEN" = Hidden then Ad Overlay should  not displayed on video even if user interact with the video.

6. If "SHOW_OVERLAY_WHEN" = alwaysVisible then Ad Overlay should always displayed on video and should not toggle with user interaction.

step.actions:

2. Setup a charles.
3. Load and Play Generic template.
4. Observe the template format.
step.expectedresults: Mute icon desisgn should be as per the specification https://docs.google.com/document/d/1I1z4ofPxQuxRicxMGv0x29uD4szPw2HIxe36IEeqFlE/edit When the ad unit is loaded into view, it should display the icon based on the publisher token. testcase.name: Verify Close button general functionality
testcase.summary: Verify Close button general functionality
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.
2. Setup a charles.
3. Load and Play Generic template.
4. Observe the template format.
step.expectedresults: Close button should immediately show up with the ad. When the close button is clicked, video should get paused and incentivized pop up should get displayed.

testcase.name: INCENTIVIZED_CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS": "0",
testcase.summary: To verify the visibility of close button.
testcase.preconditions:
1. Install the app.
2. Initialize the app.

step.actions:
1. Initialize the app.
2. Setup a charles.
3. Load and Play Generic template.
4. tap on close button during Adplay.
step.expectedresults:
1. When INCENTIVIZED_CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS is set to '0', then Close button should immediately show up with the ad. When the close button is clicked, video should get paused & incentivized pop up should get displayed.

2. When INCENTIVIZED_CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS is set to '5', then Close button should  show up after 5 sec of Adplay. When the close button is clicked, video should get paused & incentivized pop up should get displayed.

3. When INCENTIVIZED_CLOSE_BUTTON_DELAY_SECONDS is set to '999', then Close button should not displayed on video.
